headline.main: CHURCHILL MAPS LIBYAN KNOCKOUT; Tells Commons That Object of Drive Is Ruin of Foe -- News of Big Test Waited

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 20 -- Prime Minister Winston Churchill told the House of Commons today that the goal of the Libyan offensive was to destroy the Axis armies rather than to capture positions, and that the crucial battle was imminent, if not already under way.
abstract: Churchill tells Commons goal of Libyan drive is to destroy Axis armies

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
